about.summary: Generate balance tables and plots for covariates of groups preprocessed through matching, weighting or subclassification, for example, using propensity scores. Includes integration with 'MatchIt', 'twang', 'Matching', 'optmatch', 'CBPS', 'ebal', 'WeightIt', 'cem', 'sbw', and 'designmatch' for assessing balance on the output of their preprocessing functions. Users can also specify data for balance assessment not generated through the above packages. Also included are methods for assessing balance in clustered or multiply imputed data sets or data sets with longitudinal treatments.

Includes integration with 'MatchIt', 'twang', 'Matching', 'optmatch', 'CBPS', 'ebal', 'WeightIt', 'cem', 'sbw', and 'designmatch' for assessing balance on the output of their preprocessing functions. Users can also specify data for balance assessment not generated through the above packages. Also included are methods for assessing balance in clustered or multiply imputed data sets or data sets with longitudinal treatments.

name: r-cobalt

about.summary: Generate balance tables and plots for covariates of groups preprocessed through matching, weighting or subclassification, for example, using propensity scores. Includes integration with 'MatchIt', 'twang', 'Matching', 'optmatch', 'CBPS', 'ebal', 'WeightIt', 'cem', 'sbw', and 'designmatch' for assessing balance on the output of their preprocessing functions. Users can also specify data for balance assessment not generated through the above packages. Also included are methods for assessing balance in clustered or multiply imputed data sets or data sets with longitudinal treatments.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '4.2.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-cobalt
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/cobalt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/cobalt/cobalt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0a2f6710300b86e1f8a8b3b381979938bbf3711df7d786e0da30b0f228087a8e

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [r_base == "3.5.1"]
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-backports >=1.1.8
    - r-crayon
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.3.0
    - r-gridextra >=2.3.0
    - r-gtable >=0.3.0
    - r-rlang >=0.4.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-backports >=1.1.8
    - r-crayon
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.3.0
    - r-gridextra >=2.3.0
    - r-gtable >=0.3.0
    - r-rlang >=0.4.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('cobalt')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('cobalt')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ngreifer/cobalt
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Generate balance tables and plots for covariates of groups preprocessed through matching,
    weighting or subclassification, for example, using propensity scores. Includes integration
    with 'MatchIt', 'twang', 'Matching', 'optmatch', 'CBPS', 'ebal', 'WeightIt', 'cem',
    'sbw', and 'designmatch' for assessing balance on the output of their preprocessing
    functions. Users can also specify data for balance assessment not generated through
    the above packages. Also included are methods for assessing balance in clustered
    or multiply imputed data sets or data sets with longitudinal treatments.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: cobalt
# Title: Covariate Balance Tables and Plots
# Version: 4.2.2
# Authors@R: c( person("Noah", "Greifer", role=c("aut", "cre"), email = "noah.greifer@gmail.com", comment=c(ORCID="0000-0003-3067-7154")) )
# Description: Generate balance tables and plots for covariates of groups preprocessed through matching, weighting or subclassification, for example, using propensity scores. Includes integration with 'MatchIt', 'twang', 'Matching', 'optmatch', 'CBPS', 'ebal', 'WeightIt', 'cem', 'sbw', and 'designmatch' for assessing balance on the output of their preprocessing functions. Users can also specify data for balance assessment not generated through the above packages. Also included are methods for assessing balance in clustered or multiply imputed data sets or data sets with longitudinal treatments.
# Depends: R (>= 3.3.0)
# Imports: ggplot2 (>= 3.3.0), grid, gtable (>= 0.3.0), gridExtra (>= 2.3.0), rlang (>= 0.4.0), crayon, backports (>= 1.1.8)
# Suggests: MatchIt, WeightIt (>= 0.5.0), twang (>= 1.6), Matching, optmatch, cem, ebal, CBPS (>= 0.17), designmatch, optweight, mice (>= 3.8.0), MatchThem (>= 0.9.3), sbw, mlogit, knitr, rmarkdown
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# URL: https://github.com/ngreifer/cobalt
# BugReports: https://github.com/ngreifer/cobalt/issues
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-06-25 22:30:56 UTC; NoahGreifer
# Author: Noah Greifer [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3067-7154>)
# Maintainer: Noah Greifer <noah.greifer@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-06-26 15:50:03 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
